org.xwiki.platform.search

Interface SearchResponse


  • public interface SearchResponse
    Version:
    $Id$

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEndIndex(int beginIndex, int items) 
      int getHitcount()
      Hit count of search result.
      int getNextIndex(int beginIndex, int items) 
      int getPreviousIndex(int beginIndex, int items) 
      List<SearchResult> getRelevantResult()
      This method preprocess the results obtained from the QueryResponse object based on score, XWiki Rights Object.

    • Method Detail

      • getEndIndex

        int getEndIndex(int beginIndex,
              int items)
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - start index of search results set.
        items - number of results to return.
        Returns:
        the index of the last displayed search result.

      • getHitcount

        int getHitcount()
        Hit count of search result.
        Returns:
        total number of search results the user is allowed to view.

      • getNextIndex

        int getNextIndex(int beginIndex,
               int items)
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - start index of search results set.
        items - number of results to return.
        Returns:
        the value to be used for the firstIndex URL parameter to build a link pointing to the next page of results.

      • getPreviousIndex

        int getPreviousIndex(int beginIndex,
                   int items)
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - start index of search results set.
        items - number of results to return.
        Returns:
        the value to be used for the firstIndex URL parameter to build a link pointing to the previous page of results.

      • getRelevantResult

        List<SearchResult> getRelevantResult()
        This method preprocess the results obtained from the QueryResponse object based on score, XWiki Rights Object. This method is not exposed to scripting language but called from getResults method.
        Returns:
        A list containing the searchResult instances. The searchResult class contains the index fields as member variables and the get methods to access them.

      • getResults

        List<SearchResult> getResults(int beginIndex,
                            int items)
        Returns a list of search results. According to beginIndex and endIndex, only a subset of the results is returned. To get the first ten results, one would use beginIndex=1 and items=10.
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - start index of search results set.
        items - number of results to return
        Returns:
        List of SearchResult instances starting at beginIndex and containing up to items elements.

      • getTotalResults

        List<SearchResult> getTotalResults()
        This method returns all the relevant results.
        Returns:
        A list containing the searchResult instances. The searchResult class contains the index fields as member variables and the get methods to access them.

      • hasNext

        boolean hasNext(int beginIndex,
              int items)
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - start index of search results set.
        items - number of results to return.
        Returns:
        true when there are more results than currently displayed.

      • hasPrevious

        boolean hasPrevious(int beginIndex)
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - start index of search results set.
        Returns:
        true when there is a page before the one currently displayed, that is, when beginIndex > 1.
